_sText:
BREAKFLOORZM_FIXED

This is the second release of breakfloorzm.
This release fixes various bugs and graphical glitches with the original.
It also has been further optimized for better FPS and less lag.
The map also now works on Linux servers.

The entire point of this remake is that users are automatically teleported back to the top of the map if they fall into the pit below the breakable floor. This way, users don't need to type or bind !ztele or any of that, and the gameplay will therefore be much better. Of course, there will also be less chat and mic spam as a result.

Credit for the original breakfloor goes to tstar.
This map was made for ZombieMod breakfloor servers.
It was also originally a request by a ZM fan.

Enjoy. =D
Comments, assessments, and stamps are more than welcome.
Just be sure to try out the map!

Regards,

Official FPSBanana ZombieMod Representative
